Text: I recommend Aishvarya for her work and commitment to the project. It was a great working with her, as she was always willing to learn and collaborate.  We worked on the same project which she was testing my development, so we had collaboration to deliver the best results.

Job Title: AI Automation & Data Engineering Consultant (Utility Billing Analytics)
Text: I have had the pleasure of working closely with Aishvarya Salvi as a classmate, project partner, and teammate in university competitions and academic projects at the University at Buffalo.
